p: Cyanamide (2 g) was solubilized in 2 mL of water. Commercial Kuraray (1 g) was soaked in cyanamide solution and stirred for 6 h. After stirring, water was evaporated at 60 °C for 12 h. The dried solid mixture was then submitted to heat treatment at 800 °C (4 h, 1 °C min –1). After spontaneous cooling down, the product was obtained as a black fluffy powder.
